articles.description: Flipkart to kick off its Big Diwali sale from November 7, which will go on until November 13. Here's a look at the deals that the company will be offering during the sale.
articles.content:
By: Tech Desk | New Delhi | 
Updated: November 5, 2020 3:01:51 pm
During the sale, the company will be offering multiple discounts on smartphones like the Realme Narzo 20 Pro, Poco M2, Redmi 9i and… [+2388 chars]

articles.description: Check Huawei Nova 8 SE best price as on 7th November 2020. See full specifications, expert reviews, user ratings, and more. Compare Huawei Nova 8 SE prices before buying online.
articles.content: Huawei Nova 8 SE smartphone was launched on 5th November 2020. The phone comes with a 6.53-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1080x2400 pixels. Huawei Nova 8 SE is powered by an octa-core … [+1148 chars]

articles.title: Oppo Smartphone With 6.43-Inch Display Spotted on TENAA, Key Specifications Leaked - Gadgets 360
articles.description: An Oppo smartphone with model number PEGM00/ PEGT00 has been spotted on TENAA revealing that it sports a 6.43-inch display. Tipster Digital Chat Station has also shared information about an Oppo handset which seems to be the same phone spotted on TENAA.
articles.content: An Oppo smartphone with model number PEGM00/ PEGT00 has been certified by TENAA in China. The listing reveals the dimensions, display size, and rated battery capacity of the smartphone. A separate le… [+1923 chars]
